body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Keith Turner and the customer's name is Diana Lee.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am with Bright Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, I'm looking for some information regarding my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I would be happy to help you with that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you! Now, could you also confirm your phone number for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's two zero one three zero four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! Thank you for that information, John. I will now look up your account.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, John. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
